channel.title: [PI]Confused attacking styles! Need help very much!
channel.description:
[b]Hi, i need litle help.[/b]
[b]When i kill the npc whit punch,i get strenght xp:[/b]
[img]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/3416/66360087.png[/img]
[b]When i kill the npc whit kick,i get defence xp: [img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/9634/90435727.png[/img]
[b]When i kill the npc whit block i get attack xp:[/b] [img]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/5628/81546441.png[/img]
How i can fix it? Thanks in advance :)
